programme.title: The Road Ahead
programme.desc: Liam está prestes a divorciar-se quando a sua mulher Mia é diagnosticada com um cancro. Ela propõe uma viagem para recuperarem a relação e a saúde.

programme.title: Uma Criança Como Jake
programme.desc: Jake é um menino de quatro anos que prefere brincadeiras com princesas. Mas, na escola, a sua interação com o mundo revela algo mais complexo e os pais terão de refletir sobre a possibilidade de Jack ter nascido num corpo que não corresponde à sua identidade.

programme.title: Os Miseráveis
programme.desc: Stéphane, acabado de chegar de Cherbourg, vai integrar a Brigada Anti-Crime nos arredores de Paris. É aí que conhece os seus novos colegas de equipa, Chris e Gwada, e onde descobre as tensões entre os diferentes gangues locais.

programme.title: Fear the Walking Dead
Fear The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Fear the Walking Dead: Created by Dave Erickson, Robert Kirkman. With Alycia Debnam-Carey, Colman Domingo, Danay Garcia, Rubén Blades. A Walking Dead spinoff set in Los Angeles, California. programme.title: Rainha de Copas
programme.desc: Anne, uma bem-sucedida advogada, vive com as suas duas filhas e o marido Peter. Mas quando Gustav, o filho problemático de Peter de uma relação anterior, vai viver com eles, Anne cria uma relação íntima com o jovem, pondo em risco a sua vida perfeita.

programme.title: Eu. Escrava
programme.desc: Um filme que retrata o mundo do tráfico de escravos em Londres, através da história de uma jovem em luta pela sua liberdade. Historia verídica baseada na vida de Mende Nazer, atualmente uma escritora e ativista pelos Direitos Humanos.

programme.title: O Paciente Inglês
programme.desc: Durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, um avião cai no deserto do norte de África. Um homem, profundamente queimado, é salvo por nómadas e acaba num hospital de campanha na Itália. Hana, uma jovem enfermeira, permanece num velho mosteiro com o seu "paciente inglês". Moribundo, ele conta a sua história.

programme.title: Rob Roy
programme.desc: Este filme retrata a história do herói escocês do século XVIII, Robert Roy MacGregor. Entre cenários de beleza fantástica e a dura vida da comunidade, Rob Roy vê-se forçado a pedir dinheiro emprestado ao sinistro Montrose quando um duro inverno ameaça as majestosas Terras Altas escocesas.

programme.title: Minorca
programme.desc: Depois de esconder um diamante roubado no saco de uma mulher, Calvin, que mais do que anão tem o tamanho de um bebé, deve infiltrar-se na casa dela para o reaver.

programme.title: Jogos Mais Perigosos
programme.desc: Chili, um empresário ligado à vida cinematográfica, está desencantado com a indústria e resolve mudar. Tenta dedicar-se à música, conhecendo pelo caminho a viúva de um executivo do meio musical.

programme.title: Jogos Mais Perigosos
programme.desc: Chili, um empresário ligado à vida cinematográfica, está desencantado com a indústria e resolve mudar. Tenta dedicar-se à música, conhecendo pelo caminho a viúva de um executivo do meio musical.

programme.title: Lobijovem
programme.desc: Scott Howard, um estudante de liceu, acredita estar condenado à indiferença e à banalidade na cruel hierarquia escolar. No entanto, acaba por se tornar num fenómeno local quando se transforma num lobisomem.

programme.title: Deus Existe e Vive em Bruxelas
programme.desc: Deus existe! Vive em Bruxelas, é um estupor e maltrata a mulher e a filha. Sabemos muito do seu filho, mas pouco da filha. Chama-se Ea e tem 10 anos. Um dia, revolta-se contra o pai, entra no computador dele e revela a toda a gente o tempo que lhe resta.

programme.title: Rainha de Copas
programme.desc: Anne, uma bem-sucedida advogada, vive com as suas duas filhas e o marido Peter. Mas quando Gustav, o filho problemático de Peter de uma relação anterior, vai viver com eles, Anne cria uma relação íntima com o jovem, pondo em risco a sua vida perfeita.

programme.title: 300: O Início de um Império
programme.desc: O general grego Themistokles tenta unir toda a Grécia ao liderar um ataque que mudará o curso da guerra. Mas o campo de batalha é novo: o mar.

programme.title: Passageiros
programme.desc: Uma nave espacial, com destino a uma colónia distante, tem um problema nas câmaras de sono e dois passageiros, Aurora Lane e Jim Preston, acordam 90 anos antes da chegada ao destino. Ameaçados pelo iminente colapso da nave, tentam descobrir o porquê de terem acordado.
Em 480 A.C., o rei de Esparta enfrenta o poderoso exército persa no desfiladeiro das Termópilas. No entanto, uma traição ensombra a confiança cega dos gregos na vitória.

programme.title: Plano de Fuga
programme.desc: Ray Breslin, especialista em estruturas de segurança, aceita um desafio: fugir de uma instalação ultrassecreta e de alta tecnologia, "O Túmulo". Mas, uma vez prisioneiro, Breslin descobre que foi enganado e é considerado como um preso de verdade.

programme.title: Conspiração Terrorista
programme.desc: Após deixar escapar o terrorista responsável por um ataque em Paris, que resultou em dezenas de mortes, Alice Racine, à data agente da CIA, é forçada a viver em Londres como assistente social. Quando toma conhecimento de um novo perigo, o seu mentor volta a chamá-la à ação.

programme.title: O Quinto Poder
programme.desc: O fundador da Wikileaks, Julian Assange, e Daniel Domscheit-Berg, juntam-se para vigiar de forma anónima pessoas influentes e poderosas. Em pouco tempo, libertam mais notícias bombásticas do que todas as grandes empresas de media do mundo.

programme.title: A Cidade
programme.desc: Há mais de 300 assaltos a bancos por ano em Boston. Charlestown tem produzido mais assaltantes do que qualquer outro bairro. Um deles é Doug MacRay. Mas há uma diferença: ele teve a oportunidade de escolher outra vida, mas preferiu seguir as pisadas do pai e tornou-se o líder de um perigoso gangue.

programme.title: À Fria Luz do Dia
programme.desc: Will Shaw é um jovem gestor de Wall Street, cuja família é sequestrada durante uma viagem a Espanha. Will terá poucas horas para a encontrar, revelar uma conspiração governamental e descobrir a ligação que existe entre o sequestro e os segredos do seu pai.

programme.title: 6 Dias
programme.desc: Em abril de 1980, homens armados invadiram a Embaixada do Irão, em Londres. A história verdadeira dos seis dias de terror aquando da ocupação, que resultou em 26 reféns.

programme.title: O Segredo dos Seus Olhos
programme.desc: Uma equipa de investigadores do FBI vê-se dividida, quando descobre que a filha da agente Jess foi assassinada. Treze anos depois, após uma obsessiva busca pelo assassino, surge uma nova pista. Mas ninguém está preparado para um inconfessável segredo.

programme.title: The Good Doctor
The Good Doctor
programme.desc:
The Good Doctor: Created by David Shore. With Freddie Highmore, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff, Antonia Thomas. Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6470478/","name":"The Good Doctor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZjMWEwMGMtODdhMi00NGRkLTkwZTEtNmM4NjA3M2FlNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6470478/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"oneabello"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's an amazing show","reviewBody":"RANT Alright, I saw some reviews talking about how this show doesn't portray autism correctly and that this was made by "leftist-whores" pardon my French. First of all, autism is on a spectrum. Everybody who has autism experiences it differently and acts differently. Second of all, there's no need to bring politics into this. I don't see how this program is leftist at all. There are no politicians in it, no controversial methods dealing with abortion etc, nothing about the LGBT or race or feminism. Nothing in this show is about politics so I don't see how it's leftist. Anyway, thirdly and lastly, please learn grammar first before trashing something. There's a difference between "your" and "you're".

Someone also said that disabled people shouldn't be shown as "superheroes". That is an insult to all amazing disabled people such as Hellen Keller and Stephen Hawking. The people who trashed this show are probably neurotypicals with no sympathy for those with setbacks, whether mental or physical.

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 6470478, Title: The Good Doctor, --- Description: The Good Doctor: Created by David Shore. With Freddie Highmore, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff, Antonia Thomas. Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6470478/","name":"The Good Doctor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZjMWEwMGMtODdhMi00NGRkLTkwZTEtNmM4NjA3M2FlNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6470478/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"oneabello","dateCreated":"2017-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's an amazing show","reviewBody":"RANT Alright, I saw some reviews talking about how this show doesn't portray autism correctly and that this was made by "leftist-whores" pardon my French. First of all, autism is on a spectrum. Everybody who has autism experiences it differently and acts differently. Second of all, there's no need to bring politics into this. I don't see how this program is leftist at all. There are no politicians in it, no controversial methods dealing with abortion etc, nothing about the LGBT or race or feminism. Nothing in this show is about politics so I don't see how it's leftist. Anyway, thirdly and lastly, please learn grammar first before trashing something. There's a difference between "your" and "you're".

Someone also said that disabled people shouldn't be shown as "superheroes". That is an insult to all amazing disabled people such as Hellen Keller and Stephen Hawking. The people who trashed this show are probably neurotypicals with no sympathy for those with setbacks, whether mental or physical.

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Mike Listo, Steven DePaul, David Straiton, Michael Patrick Jann, Allison Liddi-Brown

Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"farshidkarimi"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Is it Just Me or....","reviewBody":"I loved this series.

But, it started a nosedive crash into boredom and sloppiness with the introduction of new actors in place of Thomas Gibson and Matthew Gray Gubler.

The new characters are dull, drab, hamming their roles and do not fit with the group nicely.

The run-time of the episodes also dropped and they wander off into the personal lives of the characters.

Is it just me who feeling the show is going downhill or other fans too?

I hope they will come back to bring the show to its former status."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":174861,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. But, it started a nosedive crash into boredom and sloppiness with the introduction of new actors in place of Thomas Gibson and Matthew Gray Gubler.

programme.desc: Em 480 A.C., o rei de Esparta enfrenta o poderoso exército persa no desfiladeiro das Termópilas. No entanto, uma traição ensombra a confiança cega dos gregos na vitória.

programme.title: 300: O Início de um Império
programme.desc: O general grego Themistokles tenta unir toda a Grécia ao liderar um ataque que mudará o curso da guerra. Mas o campo de batalha é novo: o mar.

programme.title: Wind River
programme.desc: Jane é uma agente do FBI que une forças com um caçador local, atormentado pelo passado, para investigar um homicídio ocorrido numa Reserva de Nativos Americanos. No decorrer da investigação, Jane espera vingar a morte da vítima, uma jovem rapariga.

programme.title: Inimigos Públicos
programme.desc: A polícia federal inicia uma caça ao homem na tentativa de capturar alguns dos gangsters mais famosos dos Estados Unidos, nos anos 30: John Dillinger, "Baby Face" Nelson e "Pretty Boy" Floyd.

programme.title: A Chave do Sucesso
programme.desc: Três vendedores num quarto de hotel a reflectir sobre a vida num divertido e envolvente confronto.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: O fotógrafo Dennis Stock tenta aproximar-se do ator em ascensão James Dean, a fim de conseguir um grande destaque para a revista Life. No entanto, James não lhe torna a tarefa fácil.

programme.title: Anaconda - Rasto de Sangue
programme.desc: Neste quarto episódio da saga "Anacondas", Murdoch, um poderoso magnata com pouco tempo de vida, programa uma experiência com néctar de orquídeas sanguíneas com propriedades regeneradoras e testa-o numa cria de Anaconda.

programme.title: Balas & Bolinhos - O Último Capítulo
programme.desc: A vida continua difícil para Culatra, Rato e Bino. Mas tudo muda quando Tone, o homem do Mundo, regressa a casa para tentar salvar o pai, que está às portas da morte. E quando o reencontro acontece partem para a mais surpreendente das suas aventuras.

programme.title: Resgate
programme.desc: Um milionário proprietário de uma companhia de aviação descobre que o seu filho, de nove anos, foi sequestrado e pedem-lhe um resgate de dois milhões de dólares. Inicialmente prontifica-se a pagar o resgate, mas quando conclui que vão matar o seu filho após o pagamento, decide reverter o jogo.

programme.title: Orgulho e Glória
programme.desc: A credibilidade de várias gerações de uma família de agentes da Polícia de Nova Iorque é posta em causa. Durante uma rusga, quatro polícias são abatidos e o detetive-chefe pede ao filho para liderar a investigação. Mas Ray percebe que o que parecia ser um ataque isolado foi, afinal, uma emboscada.

programme.title: Enquanto Somos Jovens
programme.desc: Josh e Cornelia formam um feliz casal de meia-idade, cuja vida se vai alterar depois de conhecerem Jamie e Darby, um jovem casal de espírito livre. Em pouco tempo, os quarentões colocam de parte os amigos da sua idade para seguirem estes jovens hipsters.

programme.title: O Último a Cair
programme.desc: Durante a Lei Seca nos EUA, um pistoleiro é apanhado no meio de uma guerra entre gangsters das máfias italiana e irlandesa.

programme.title: Assassinos Substitutos
programme.desc: A hesitação de um assassino a soldo em cumprir a missão de morte de que foi incumbido coloca-o na mira de implacáveis atiradores encarregues de o eliminar.

programme.title: Catwoman
programme.desc: Patience Phillips trabalha na Hedare Beauty, uma gigantesca companhia de cosméticos. No entanto, quando descobre inadvertidamente um segredo, é apanhada no meio de uma sórdida conspiração. Morta pela sua patroa, Patience renasce transformada em "Catwoman" e dotada de poderes sobrenaturais.

programme.title: O Fugitivo
programme.desc: O médico Richard Kimble, injustamente acusado da morte da mulher, escapa da prisão para encontrar o verdadeiro assassino. Enquanto o procura, é perseguido por um implacável polícia. Acerca do criminoso, Kimble apenas sabe que não tem um braço...

programme.title: O Caloiro da Droga
programme.desc: Malcom é um "geek" que tenta sobreviver num bairro violento em Los Angeles, ao mesmo tempo que procura entrar numa faculdade. No entanto, a sua vida muda quando recebe um convite para uma festa "underground", que o leva numa aventura à descoberta de si mesmo.

programme.title: O Corvo Branco
programme.desc: A história da deserção do lendário bailarino russo Rudolf Nureyev, da União Soviética para o Ocidente. Deslumbrado por Paris, o então jovem bailarino quer consumir toda aquela cultura, mas os agentes da KGB acabam por forçá-lo a tomar uma decisão...

programme.title: Miles Ahead
programme.desc: A meio de uma carreira na vanguarda do jazz moderno, Miles Davis afasta-se abruptamente da vida pública. Sozinho em casa, Miles é atormentado por dores, pela sua voz musical entorpecida por drogas e pela mente assombrada por fantasmas do passado.

programme.title: 21: A Última Cartada
programme.desc: Para pagar o curso de Medicina, Ben, um sobredotado do MIT, tenta fazer dinheiro em jogos de cartas. Ele acaba por se juntar à equipa secreta do seu professor de matemática, que, contando cartas e usando um complexo sistema de sinais, consegue "quebrar" vários casinos.

programme.title: Mulher de Ouro
programme.desc: A notável história verídica da jornada da judia Maria Altmann para recuperar o seu património e justiça para a família. Sessenta anos depois de ter fugido de Viena, durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, a mulher tenta recuperar os bens da família, que foram apreendidos pelos nazis.

programme.title: Mitos Urbanos 2
programme.desc: Amy, Travis e Graham são estudantes de cinema na Universidade de Alpine. Num ambiente de forte competividade, é convocado o prestigiado prémio Hitchcock para o melhor fime, como tese de final de curso. Quando começam a rodar o filme, dão-se estranhos e terroríficos acidentes.

programme.title: A Teoria de Tudo
programme.desc: A extraordinária história de uma das mentes mais brilhantes dos nossos tempos, o astrofísico Stephen Hawking, e de duas pessoas que, por amor, desafiam todas as probabilidades. O filme é baseado nas memórias de Jane Hawking.

programme.title: Anaconda - Rasto de Sangue
programme.desc: Neste quarto episódio da saga "Anacondas", Murdoch, um poderoso magnata com pouco tempo de vida, programa uma experiência com néctar de orquídeas sanguíneas com propriedades regeneradoras e testa-o numa cria de Anaconda.

programme.title: Manchester By The Sea
programme.desc: A vida do solitário Lee Chandler é irreversivelmente transformada quando volta à sua cidade natal para cuidar do sobrinho. Patrick ficou órfão e Lee foi nomeado tutor do jovem de 16 anos. Mas além das dificuldades evidentes que tem pela frente, o regresso de Lee vai ainda reabrir feridas antigas.

programme.title: Predador 2
programme.desc: Vem de uma galáxia distante para caçar e deixa um rasto de cadáveres na sua passagem. Em estado de sítio devido a uma guerra entre gangues, Los Angeles é o campo de caça perfeito para o Predador. O tenente Mike Harrigan decide investigar e coloca-se frente a frente do enigmático alienígena.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: O fotógrafo Dennis Stock tenta aproximar-se do ator em ascensão James Dean, a fim de conseguir um grande destaque para a revista Life. No entanto, James não lhe torna a tarefa fácil.

programme.title: DragonHeart: Coração de Dragão
programme.desc: Nos tempos antigos, quando majestosos respiradores de fogo sobrevoavam os céus, Bowen fica face a face e coração a coração com o último dragão na Terra, Draco. Enquanto tenta travar um rei tirano, Bowen percebe que a tarefa será mais difícil do que imaginou: se matar o rei, Draco também morrerá.

programme.title: Outbreak - Fora de Controlo
programme.desc: O coronel Daniels e a sua equipa de investigadores, especializada em doenças infetocontagiosas, encontram numa aldeia do Zaire uma epidemia devastadora. De regresso aos Estados Unidos, trabalham dia e noite para isolar o vírus e descobrir a sua origem.

programme.title: Passageiros
programme.desc: Uma nave espacial, com destino a uma colónia distante, tem um problema nas câmaras de sono e dois passageiros, Aurora Lane e Jim Preston, acordam 90 anos antes da chegada ao destino. Ameaçados pelo iminente colapso da nave, tentam descobrir o porquê de terem acordado.

programme.title: The Hunter's Prayer - Assassino Contratado
programme.desc: Jules, um assassino profissional, vai contra as ordens dos seus chefes e acaba a proteger Ella, a jovem que tinha sido contratado para matar. Assinalados para morrer, Jules e Ella formam uma aliança que coloca em risco as suas vidas.

programme.title: Assassinos Substitutos
programme.desc: A hesitação de um assassino a soldo em cumprir a missão de morte de que foi incumbido coloca-o na mira de implacáveis atiradores encarregues de o eliminar.

programme.title: Guerra de Casamentos
programme.desc: Depois de um organizador de festas gay descobrir que o irmão está por trás do discurso do governador contra o casamento entre homossexuais, decide fazer greve para exigir direitos iguais.

programme.title: Páscoa Infiltrada
programme.desc: Erin Cavendish infiltra-se na fábrica de chocolate da família para ver porque é que as vendas baixaram, e lá conhece o chefe chocolateiro Bryan, que tem ideias para inovar a linha de produtos para a Páscoa.

programme.title: A Mudança das Estações
programme.desc: À medida que se vão conhecendo melhor, a hostilidade existente entre um agricultor viúvo e uma ornitóloga atrevida, que veio para a sua quinta com o objetivo de salvar uma família de cisnes, transforma-se em algo mais...

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Chassez Le Naturel, Il Revient Au Galop
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. programme.title: Música e Letra
programme.desc: Alex Fletcher, um antigo elemento de um popular grupo dos anos 80, junta-se à "palavrosa" Sophie para comporem uma canção, que se destina a uma jovem estrela pop.

programme.title: Dança Feroz
programme.desc: Após a morte da mãe, o cubano Rafael Infante vai para Houston trabalhar na escola de dança de John Burnett. Faz limpezas e pequenos serviços, enquanto observa os dançarinos e se apaixona por Ruby, que sonha vencer o Campeonato Mundial de Las Vegas, mesmo que, para isso, tenha de abrir mão do amor.

programme.title: Quase Famosos
programme.desc: O repórter William Miller consegue uma oportunidade na revista Rolling Stone. Apesar das objeções da sua mãe, William faz-se à estrada com uma recém-descoberta banda de rock e apercebe-se de que há muito mais para escrever sobre eles para além da sua música.

programme.title: Amor Sem Aviso
programme.desc: George Wade é um executivo milionário que não toma uma decisão sem Lucy Kelson, a sua chefe de Conselho na Corporação Wade. Confrontado com a possibilidade de Lucy sair da sua vida, será tarde demais para George dizer "amo-te"?

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: Um remake do filme que encantou os mais novos na década de 80, que conta a história de Annie, uma jovem órfã, que mora com a sua maldosa mãe de acolhimento. Mas tudo muda quando um arrogante magnata a acolhe em sua casa, numa disfarçada ação de campanha.

programme.title: Anna Karenina
programme.desc: Rússia czarista, final do século XIX. Anna é casada com Alexei Karenin, um destacado oficial. Mas tudo muda quando conhece o irresistível conde Vronsky, que altera a visão que ela tem de si e do mundo. Porém, o caso amoroso torna-se conhecido e Karenin sofre com as humilhações da opinião pública.

programme.title: Tróia
programme.desc: Na Grécia Antiga, Paris, príncipe de Tróia, seduz Helena, a rainha de Esparta, mas essa paixão desencadeia uma guerra de proporções inimagináveis. Por seu lado, Menelaus, o rei de Esparta, pede ao irmão Agamemnon, rei de Micenas, que reúna o povo grego para vingar a honra da família.

programme.title: O Décimo Círculo
programme.desc: Daniel Stone, um autor de BD, é casado com a professora universitária Laura. A filha de ambos, Trixie, é uma aluna inteligente e popular do primeiro ano do secundário. Quando Trixie diz ter sido violada pelo ex-namorado, os acontecimentos irão pôr à prova lealdades e ligações de todos os envolvidos.

programme.title: Morning Show Mysteries: Intenções Criminosas
programme.desc: O corpo de um advogado cujos casos inspiraram uma série de livros de sucesso é encontrado na praia e Billie Blessing tem de deslindar o enredo antes que a pessoa errada pague pelo crime.

programme.title: Morning Show Mysteries: Contagem para a Morte
programme.desc: Quando um estimado dono de supermercado é morto, a dona de restaurantes e chef da televisão Billie Blessing envolve-se na investigação do que parece ser a obra de um assassino em série inteligente e sinistro.

programme.title: Expiação
programme.desc: Verão de 1935. A família Tallis vive tranquilamente na sua mansão. Além disso, a pequena Briony já descobriu a sua vocação: quer ser romancista. Mas quando, do alto dos seus 13 anos, surpreende a irmã Cecilia com o filho do caseiro, Robbie, a sua reação ciumenta e ingénua vai provocar uma tragédia.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Abondance de Biens Ne Nuit Pas

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Ce Qui Ne Tue Pas Rend Plus Fort
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. programme.title: O Amor nos Tempos de Cólera
programme.desc: Florentino, rejeitado pela bela Fermina quando era jovem, dedica a maior parte da sua vida adulta a relações carnais, numa tentativa desesperada de curar o seu coração partido.

programme.title: Guerra de Casamentos
programme.desc: Depois de um organizador de festas gay descobrir que o irmão está por trás do discurso do governador contra o casamento entre homossexuais, decide fazer greve para exigir direitos iguais.

programme.title: Daniel: Amizade Aterradora
programme.desc: Luke é um jovem perturbado que acaba de entrar na universidade. Para conseguir lidar com um violento trauma familiar, ele ressuscita o seu amigo imaginário de infância, Daniel, sem perceber o quão perigoso ele é.

programme.title: Her Smell - A Música Nas Veias
programme.desc: Uma cantora de punk rock autodestrutiva luta por se manter sóbria, enquanto tenta recuperar a inspiração e a criatividade que catapultou a sua banda para o sucesso.

programme.title: K-Pax - Um Homem do Outro Mundo
programme.desc: Prot é um paciente de um hospício que diz ser oriundo de um planeta longínquo, K-Pax. Só que quando o seu psiquiatra procura a melhor forma de o ajudar, começa a perceber que o dito extraterrestre possui poderes misteriosos sobre a saúde mental dos outros doentes.

programme.title: Despedida de Casado
programme.desc: Um recém-divorciado tenta superar o trauma da separação através de uma enorme festa de "despedida de casado".

programme.title: Snow: Uma Viagem Heroica (V.P.)
programme.desc: Para salvar o irmão, Kiara e a sua doninha de estimação têm de chegar até à malévola Rainha da Neve. Contudo, para isso terão de atravessar um deserto gelado e os vilões que o povoam. Pelo caminho, Kiara conta ainda com a inesperada ajuda de um trol.

programme.title: Looney Tunes: De Novo em Acção (V.O.)
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny e Daffy Duck embarcam em mais uma aventura que combina animação e imagem real. Daffy Duck deixa Hollywood, farto de ver Bugs Bunny ser o centro das atenções, e alia-se a um duplo recentemente despedido. O objetivo é recuperar o Diamante Azul e impedir que a Corporação ACME domine o mundo.

programme.title: Esquecido
programme.desc: Estamos em 2073 e todo o planeta se encontra destruído após um ataque alienígena, há 60 anos, que obrigou à evacuação da população. Jack Harper é enviado para terminar uma missão cuja importância é vital para a sobrevivência da Humanidade, que vive agora numa colónia sob condições artificiais.

programme.title: Assalto à Paróquia
programme.desc: Durell e LeeJohn são pequenos criminosos que inventam um esquema mirabolante para assaltar a igreja da vizinhança e, assim, conseguirem pagar uma dívida. Só que nada, mas mesmo nada, vai correr como esperavam...

programme.title: Tempo de Glória
programme.desc: Robert Gould Shaw lidera, durante a Guerra Civil, a primeira unidade de soldados voluntários negros. No entanto, além de combater o preconceito do inimigo, os Estados Confederados, o coronel terá também de lidar com o mesmo tipo de problemas dentro do próprio Exército da União.

programme.title: Os Quebra-Ossos
programme.desc: Paul Crewe é um jogador de futebol americano que, juntamente com Nate Scarborough, treinador do mesmo género, se encontra a cumprir uma pena de prisão. Juntos, decidem organizar uma equipa que jogue contra os guardas.

programme.title: Águas Perigosas
programme.desc: Nancy está sozinha numa praia isolada a fazer surf. Atacada por um tubarão, refugia-se num rochedo, a 200 metros da costa. Para salvar-se, terá de recorrer a todos os seus recursos e vontade, para ultrapassar o enorme tubarão branco.

programme.title: Desafio Total
programme.desc: Douglas Quaid, um trabalhador comum, suspeita ser um espião, depois de uma visita à Rekall, uma empresa que implanta falsas memórias nos seus clientes. A linha entre a fantasia e a realidade fica confusa e o mundo de Quaid balança.

programme.title: Passageiro 57
programme.desc: O avião é o meio de transporte mais seguro, diz-se. Só se não contar com os riscos. Rane já planeou quatro assaltos terroristas e, em breve, haverá um quinto: o que é uma má notícia para os passageiros do Voo 163.

programme.title: Tubarão
programme.desc: Quando um tubarão-branco começa a caçar pessoas nas praias de Nova Inglaterra, o xerife Brody, um especialista em tubarões e um pescador veterano iniciam uma perigosa demanda para caçar a criatura.

programme.title: Mandy
programme.desc: Red e Mandy levam uma vida tranquila numa cabana isolada junto a um lago do Colorado. Um dia, a sua casa é invadida por membros de uma seita religiosa que matam Mandy e deixam Red à beira da morte. Traumatizado, apenas uma coisa o mantém preso à vida: um intenso desejo de punir os responsáveis.

programme.title: Paterson
programme.desc: Paterson é um motorista que conduz o mesmo turno do autocarro 23. Escuta as conversas dos seus passageiros, observa como interagem, como se movimentam e como respiram. Nas horas vagas, escreve poemas sobre os dias iguais que vive.

programme.title: Cometa
programme.desc: Situada num universo paralelo, a história de "Cometa" salta para trás e para a frente na linha de tempo, percorrendo seis anos da vida de um casal improvável, mas perfeitamente emparelhado.

programme.title: Danças Com Lobos
programme.desc: Em 1863, durante a Guerra Civil Americana, o Tenente John Dunbar é colocado num posto remoto, onde, pouco a pouco, vai criando amizade com os lobos e os índios, tornando-se uma aberração intolerável para o exército.

programme.title: Os Anjos de Charlie: Potência Máxima
programme.desc: O trio prepara-se para recuperar duas alianças: mas não são uns anéis quaisquer. Contêm informação encriptada que revela informações preciosas acerca de pessoas inseridas no programa de proteção de testemunhas. Quando as testemunhas começam a morrer, só os Anjos podem travar o assassino.

programme.title: Equipa Mortal
programme.desc: Melvin Smiley é um assassino neurótico e absolutamente banal que trabalha para dois chefes criminosos. Um deles propõe ao stressado Melvin que rapte Keiko, a filha mais nova de um abastado industrial japonês, sem saber que ela é a afilhada do outro.

programme.title: O Professor Chanfrado
programme.desc: O professor de genética Sherman Klump tem excesso de peso e, desesperado para conquistar a bela Carla, bebe um soro experimental para emagrecer. Sherman transforma-se em "Buddy Love", um conversador, energético e esbelto Don Juan!

programme.title: Operação Swordfish
programme.desc: Stanley Jobson é um super hacker, que está em liberdade condicional após ter sido preso por lançar um vírus informático no sistema do FBI. Entretanto, é recrutado à força por uma unidade secreta de contraterrorismo chamada Black Cell.

programme.title: Warcraft: O Primeiro Encontro de Dois Mundos
programme.desc: O pacífico reino de Azeroth fica à beira da guerra quando a sua civilização enfrenta uma temível raça de invasores. Quando um portal se abre para ligar os dois mundos, dois heróis são colocados numa rota de colisão que irá decidir o futuro.

programme.title: G.I. Jane - Até ao Limite
programme.desc: Uma senadora consegue que a tenente Jordan O'Neil seja a primeira mulher autorizada a treinar na mais alta unidade de operações secretas americanas, os Navy Seals. Só que toda a gente espera que ela falhe e desista.

programme.title: Tubarão
programme.desc: Quando um tubarão-branco começa a caçar pessoas nas praias de Nova Inglaterra, o xerife Brody, um especialista em tubarões e um pescador veterano iniciam uma perigosa demanda para caçar a criatura.

programme.title: Perdido em Marte
programme.desc: Durante uma missão a Marte, o astronauta Mark Watney é dado como morto e deixado para trás pela tripulação. Mas Watney sobreviveu e encontra-se preso e só num planeta hostil. Agora, terá de encontrar forma de enviar para a Terra um sinal de que está vivo.

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Monstros vs. Aliens (V.P.)
programme.desc: No dia do seu casamento, Susan Murphy é atingida por um meteorito que a deixa gigante. Susan é imediatamente capturada pelo Governo, que a junta com outros monstros num laboratório de segurança máxima.

programme.title: A Vida Secreta dos Nossos Bichos (V.P.)
programme.desc: Uma divertida comédia sobre a vida dos nossos animais de estimação, a partir do momento em que saímos para o trabalho ou para a escola todos os dias. Afinal, o que é que acontece após os donos fecharem a porta de casa?

programme.title: Viagem ao Centro da Terra 2: A Ilha Misteriosa
programme.desc: Sean Anderson recebe um sinal de socorro codificado vindo de uma misteriosa ilha. Incapaz de impedir Sean de embarcar nesta aventura, o seu padrasto Hank junta-se à viagem. Com um piloto e a filha, partem em busca da ilha para resgatarem um habitante solitário. Mas será que vão conseguir escapar?

programme.title: Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy tem de transportar uma droga sintética dentro do próprio corpo. Quando é apanhada e agredida, o saco rompe-se e a droga é assimilada pelo seu organismo. Transformada numa verdadeira máquina de matar, tem apenas uma coisa em mente: encontrar uma forma de parar os efeitos e salvar a sua vida.

programme.title: Esquadrão Suicida
programme.desc: Uma agência governamental secreta recruta alguns dos mais perigosos, até agora encarcerados, Super Vilões do mundo. Juntos, formam uma equipa improvável e são armados com o mais poderoso arsenal à disposição. Derrotar uma enigmática e invencível entidade: eis a missão do Esquadrão Suicida!

programme.title: Arranha-Céus
programme.desc: O edifício mais alto e seguro do mundo está em chamas e Will, um perito em segurança que ali se deslocou em trabalho, é injustamente culpado pelo incêndio. Em fuga, Will tem de encontrar os culpados e salvar a sua família, presa dentro do edifício.

programme.title: Point Break - Caçadores de Emoções
programme.desc: Um jovem agente do FBI infiltra-se num grupo de bandidos, amantes de desportos radicais, suspeito de cometer os mais bizarros e assustadores assaltos. O agente rapidamente consegue aproximar-se de Bodhi, o líder do grupo, e conquistar a sua confiança.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: Na Inglaterra do século XIII, Robin e o seu grupo de saqueadores combatem a corrupção numa pequena cidade, desafiando a Coroa a retificar o balanço de poder entre o Rei e os seus súbditos. Tendo como aliada Lady Marian, Robin tornar-se-á num símbolo eterno de liberdade para o seu povo.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Created by Frank Darabont. With Norman Reedus, Melissa McBride, Lauren Cohan, Josh McDermitt. programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job. Needless to say I'm CSI:M number 1 fan"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54868,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324","dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job. programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS.
